articles.title: Manika Batra’s secret to potential Olympic success: a fat motivational book, a surprise twiddle switch of racquet, and a mother’s emotional support - The Indian Express
articles.description: In the last decade, Manika turned into a massive Virat Kohli fan, for his very relatable Delhi persona. "It's because of how he handles everything that happens to him, and how passionate he's about winning through all that. And how he enjoys playing cricket,"…
articles.content: Manika Batra cant readily remember the name of that motivational book she reads before every TT match. Ek moti-si kitaab hai, she describes the 280 pager which works for her like a charm. A fat book.… [+7362 chars]
